content: The added administrators will be able to create rooms using this template.

comment.text: The "AddUsersOrGroupsDescription" translation key describes a text that explains the purpose of adding administrators to create rooms using a specific template. It is used in the UI to provide context and clarity when allowing users to add administrators or groups for room creation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses the plural form 'Přidaní správci' (Added administrators) which implies multiple administrators were added. The English sentence indicates a single administrator or a group that collectively function as one. It might be more accurate to use the singular form.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Přidaný správce bude moci vytvářet místnosti pomocí této šablony.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'administrators' is translated as 'pääkäyttäjät' which literally means 'main users'. While understandable, 'ylläpitäjät' (maintainers) would be a more accurate and common translation in this context, referring to those with administrative privileges.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lisätyt ylläpitäjät voivat luoda ryhmiä käyttäen tätä mallia.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිපාලකවරුන්' (paripaalakavarun) can be slightly improved to 'පරිපාලකයින්' (paripaalakin) for a more natural and common usage.
The word 'шаблон' is spelled correctly, but its usage might be slightly off. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing might be preferred depending on the specific context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider if 'предложак' might be a more suitable alternative to 'шаблон' depending on the overall tone and context. 'Шаблон' is generally used for more rigid, pre-defined templates.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Dodati administratori moći će da kreiraju sobe koristeći ovaj šablon' while conveying the general meaning, isn't the most natural or precise translation. A more accurate and fluent translation would focus on the action being enabled by the administrators.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Administratori koji su dodati moći će da kreiraju sobe koristeći ovaj šablon.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Quản trị viên đã thêm sẽ có thể tạo phòng bằng mẫu này" doesn't fully capture the meaning of "The added administrators will be able to create rooms using this template." The phrase "đã thêm" (already added) implies a one-time action. The English implies ongoing access. A better translation would emphasize the ability to create rooms moving forward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Quản trị viên được thêm sẽ có thể tạo phòng bằng mẫu này.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase "Quản trị viên được thêm" sounds slightly unnatural. "Quản trị viên đã thêm" is commonly used, but "được thêm" is more precise in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing for more natural flow, but accuracy is paramount.
